items.name: Aramy Wanderer Boots
items.description:
Rugged boots of the Aramy wandering survivor. Reliable, they help in all conditions.

These boots have traveled countless miles, wandering. Behind they leave not just footsteps, but thankful friends and grateful lives.

items.name: Aramy Wanderer Boots
items.description:
Rugged boots of the Aramy wandering survivor. Reliable, they help in all conditions.

These boots have traveled countless miles, wandering. Behind they leave not just footsteps, but thankful friends and grateful lives.

items.name: Aramy Wanderer Gloves
items.description:
Padded, rugged gloves of the Aramy wandering survivor. Reliable, these well-worn gloves excell in all situations.

These gloves have gripped many tools, creature reigns, and weapons over their lifetime. They will firmly grasp many more to come, in the name of others.

items.name: Aramy Wanderer Gloves
items.description:
Padded, rugged gloves of the Aramy wandering survivor. Reliable, these well-worn gloves excell in all situations.

These gloves have gripped many tools, creature reigns, and weapons over their lifetime. They will firmly grasp many more to come, in the name of others.

items.name: Aramy Wanderer Goggles and hat
items.description:
Headgear of the Aramy wandering survivor. Rugged like desert cloth, reliable under many conditions. Goggles can help in sandstorm conditions.

Like their owner, they have braved countless storms and weather conditions. Alongside their owner, they faced countless, agredious foes and threats alike... and they both remain strong and clear-sighted, despite it all.

items.name: Aramy Wanderer Goggles and hat
items.description:
Headgear of the Aramy wandering survivor. Rugged like desert cloth, reliable under many conditions. Goggles can help in sandstorm conditions.

Like their owner, they have braved countless storms and weather conditions. Alongside their owner, they faced countless, agredious foes and threats alike... and they both remain strong and clear-sighted, despite it all.

items.name: Aramy Wanderer Pants
items.description:
Padded, Rugged clothes of the Aramy wandering survivor. Reliable, they are durable and can survive many conditions.

These pants shielded powerful, determined legs; which treaded through countless environments and territories in search of something nearly unobtainable. Their journey and duty is far from over.

items.name: Aramy Wanderer Pants
items.description:
Padded, Rugged clothes of the Aramy wandering survivor. Reliable, they are durable and can survive many conditions.

These pants shielded powerful, determined legs; which treaded through countless environments and territories in search of something nearly unobtainable. Their journey and duty is far from over.

items.name: Aramy Wanderer Shirt
items.description:
A padded, rugged shirt of the Aramy wandering survivor. Lightweight, durable, and reliable for any condition.

This rugged, well-worn chest armor is designed to be as durable and versatile as possible for its owner, who was always on the move in answer to a ceaseless calling. The light garment covered a heavy, warm, and open heart.

items.name: Aramy Wanderer Shirt
items.description:
A padded, rugged shirt of the Aramy wandering survivor. Lightweight, durable, and reliable for any condition.

This rugged, well-worn chest armor is designed to be as durable and versatile as possible for its owner, who was always on the move in answer to a ceaseless calling. The light garment covered a heavy, warm, and open heart.

items.name: 2xHealth
items.description: Why does my npc boss have barely any fuckin hea-oh yeah, its lvl up rates are fucked.

items.name: Arenaline Buff
items.description: Da final countdown?

items.name: Bleed Immunity
items.description: Dab on bleed-inflicting dinos.

items.name: Treyour RP Aura
items.description: You legit shouldn't have this. This is strictly for use by the Admin on Pyria official servers that controls the story-centered character Treyour Ackerman.

items.name: Treyour Awakened
items.description: Fight on, Key of Divinity!

items.name: Eternal Blaze
items.description: For characters immune to fire

items.name: Worldboss buff
items.description: Hyperboss makes creatures go spook

items.name: Eternal Freeze
items.description: For characters immune to ice

items.name: Leadership Buff
items.description: Power?

items.name: Undead Player Buff (Lich)
items.description: Spooki Very

items.name: Lvl 1 Admin Avatar Buff
items.description: For characters slightly stronger than the average person.

items.name: Lvl 2 Admin Character
items.description: Buff scales the character with stats fitting of races such as Dravir.

items.name: Lvl 2 Admin Character (Hope)
items.description: Buff scales the character with stats fitting of races such as Dravir.

items.name: Lvl 3 Buff
items.description: Why do you hear boss music? Oh, wait...

items.name: Lvl 3 Buff (Hope)
items.description: For a very badass Nephilim.

items.name: Player Nerf
items.description: Removes avatar buffs from pyria

items.name: Rider Buff
items.description: This'll end horribly

items.name: Remove Rider Buff
items.description: This'll end horribly

items.name: Robot Player Buff
items.description: Beep Boop, Boop Beep?

items.name: Scholarly Buff
items.description: Intelligent

items.name: Torpor Immunity
items.description: Tf is sleep? You're too tired from your existential depression already.

items.name: Undead Player Buff
items.description: Spooki

items.name: Venom Immunity Buff
items.description: Dab on venom-inflicting dinos.

items.name: Aquatic Avatar Buff
items.description: For aquatic characters. Gain stamina underwater, and rapidly gain oxygen underwater.

items.name: Adventurer's Canteen
items.description: Safely carries a large amount of water, and is reasonably lightweight. When you're a world as adventure-heavy as Pyria, knowing how to carry resources as effeciently as possible is a must.

items.name: Pyrian Climbing Pick
items.description:
Climbing Picks made and infused with Earth Element for stability.

These things will LAST!

items.name: Assasin Arrow
items.description: An arrow drenched in an extremely fatal concoction of poisons. Kills any human in seconds: perfect for assasinations. Requiring a steady hand, it can only be used with traditional wooden bows.

items.name: Bazelnade Fire Arrow
items.description: An arrow embued with Fire elemental magic and Bazel Crystals. Can only be used from a crossbow. When fired, the element re-forms the explosive Bazel crystals midflight. This takes away the fire debuff, but causes the projectile to launch and detonate violently with sheer pinpoint explosive power. Heavy, but Excellent for concussion tames.

items.name: Earth Arrow
items.description: An arrow embued with Earth elemental magic. Can only be used from a crossbow. When fired, the magic within quickly pulls in earth (stone, dirt, rocks) from the surrounding area, and impacts as a solid mass into the target. Good for buildings or "concussion-tames".

items.name: Ilias Arrow
items.description: An Arrow said to be given by the Goddess of Light to those who perform great deeds on rare occasion as a reward. Although it can only be used with a standard wooden bow, it will knock out ANY normal KO-tame creature in 5 minutes with a single shot.

items.name: Lighted Arrow
items.description: An arrow infused with Mana. Mildly stronger than a normal arrow, and deals slightly increased damage to undeads and evil foes.

items.name: Aura Arrow
items.description: An arrow created with Light Mana: it's not even technically a physical object! Just as strong as those wielded by Divine Archers: smiting dark foes with ease.

items.name: Dark Aura Arrow
items.description: An arrow created with Dark Mana: it's not even technically a physical object! Just as strong as those wielded by Dark Archers: smiting light foes with ease. These shots have the power to inflict blood curse.

items.name: Mithril Arrow
items.description: A Pyrian arrow tipped in Mithril. The fine mithril blade practically slices the air itself, leading to a ferocious arrow unlike any other: even aura arrows. The arrow has practically no falloff and is terifyingly fast. While it can be used from a crossbow, its results if used from a proper bow or compound bow lead to a terrifying projectile with speed and power unmatched: even underwater.

items.name: Soothing Arrow
items.description:
An arrow created with Light Mana: it's not even technically a physical object! Though this one lacks damage. It uses the natural properties of Light Mana to calm raging wild animals, and allowing them to form bonds again. Useful for subduing creatures a bit too violent in the moment.

NOTE: Focus on rate of fire, rather than amount of damage per shot. A high-quality bow does nothing different than a primitve one!

items.name: Venom Arrow
items.description: An arrow drenched in cockatrice venom. Inflicts the Venom stats on a target.

items.name: Bazel Crystal Spear Bolt
items.description: A fearsome spear bolt, with a Bazel Crystal carefully attached at the head. Fired from a Boom Cannon, it is devastatingly powerful.

items.name: Unleash Chosen Aura
items.description:
This special potion unleashes your aura, causing it to grow in power to your own strength, from overcoming challenges. Certain aura-sensitve creatures may take notice....

"May you and your aura continue to grow in strength, young one."

items.name: Unleash Chosen Aura (Aberration)
items.description:
This special potion unleashes your aura, causing it to grow in power to your own strength, from overcoming challenges. Certain aura-sensitve creatures may take notice....

"May you and your aura continue to grow in strength, young one."
(This version is compatible for Aberration!)

items.name: Unleash Chosen Aura (Center)
items.description:
This special potion unleashes your aura, causing it to grow in power to your own strength, from overcoming challenges. Certain aura-sensitve creatures may take notice....

"May you and your aura continue to grow in strength, young one."
(This version is compatible for The Center!)

items.name: Unleash Chosen Aura (Extinction)
items.description:
This special potion unleashes your aura, causing it to grow in power to your own strength, from overcoming challenges. Certain aura-sensitve creatures may take notice....

"May you and your aura continue to grow in strength, young one."
(This version is compatible for Extinction!)

items.name: Unleash Chosen Aura (Scorched)
items.description:
This special potion unleashes your aura, causing it to grow in power to your own strength, from overcoming challenges. Certain aura-sensitve creatures may take notice....

"May you and your aura continue to grow in strength, young one."
(This version is compatible for Scorched Earth!)

items.name: Air Element
items.description: The Element of Air is associated with speed, as well as agility, and even carefree or airheaded behavior. Used in spells and magic within Pyria.

items.name: Dragon Element
items.description: The immensely powerful, archaic Dragon Element is shrouded in mystery. Only the Dragon Kings know of its true power and use, but they refuse to speak to non-dragons about it. Used in spells and magic within Pyria.

items.name: Earth Element
items.description: The Element of Earth is associated pure physical strength and unyielding endurance.  Used in spells and magic within Pyria.

items.name: Fire Element
items.description: The Element of Fire is associated with passion and anger, as well as power or willpower. Used in spells and magic within Pyria.

items.name: Ice Element
items.description: Ice is an element that is a sub-element or subset of Water element, with its own resistances and advantages. It is often associated with a strange mix of things: beauty, cruelty, and an impassive nature to all.

items.name: Nature Element
items.description:
The Element of Nature is normally associated with aspects like beauty, growth, and maternal instict. 

As such, it ranks among the best of elements for healing magic, alongside Light and Water.

items.name: Water Element
items.description: The Element of Water is associated with serenity, as well as calmness of mind and fluidity. Used in spells and magic within Pyria.

items.name: Mega Dash Potion
items.description: Grants any tame an incredible amount of stamina by GREATLY multiplying it's maximum stamina for 15 minutes before returning to normal. Has a hefty cooldown, and as penalty, instantly starves a tame on use. Defeat an ArchDemon to unlock this.

items.name: Coldblock Potion
items.description: A potion that blocks out all external cold for 15 minutes. Cannot be used with Heatblock potion: will completely cancel effects.

items.name: Self-Blizzard Potion
items.description: A potion that blocks out all external cold for 15 minutes. Cannot be used with Heatblock potion: will completely cancel effects. This potion will even prevent against freezing. Defeat a Diorex to unlock this.

items.name: Divine Aura Potion
items.description: An extremely rare potion. Ingesting it casts the "Divine Aura" Spell: making your aura similar to theirs temporarily. It can help in granting immunity to environmental hazzards.

items.name: Grand Elixir
items.description: Heals 250 HP per second for 10 seconds. Recovers 100 food per sec to compensate.Not for player consumption.

items.name: Great Elixir
items.description: Heals 80 HP pers second for 10 seconds. Recovers 20 food per sec to compensate.

items.name: Heatblock Potion
items.description: A potion that blocks out all external heat for 15 minutes. Cannot be used with Coldblock potion: will completely cancel effects.

items.name: Self-Inferno Potion
items.description: A rare, extremely upgraded version of the Heatblock potion. Though its effect does not last as long, it prevents the user from being set aflame in almost any way! DISCLAIMER: will not prevent against lava, and wont work with Heat or Coldblock potions. Defeat a Diorex to unlock this engram.

items.name: Light Elixir
items.description: Heals 200 health in 10 seconds. A good item to use for players with lower health caps.Slightly regenerates food to compensate.

items.name: High Elixir
items.description: Heals 25% of health over 60 seconds. A must-have for prolonged combat. Defeat an Ogre, or any sort of Pyrian "alpha" creature to unlock this.

items.name: Num Num Steak
items.description: A super-tasty cut of meat wrapped in meat with the right seasonings. The only meat an herbivore will WANT to eat. Can only be used on tames, but it'll restore a large amount of their hunger. Good for ravenous critters like Giganotosaurus or Daeodon, in the right situations!

items.name: Oxylast Potion
items.description: Consuming this potion drastically increases one's oxygen. It also increases your base swimming speed. This effect lasts roughly 30 minutes. Perfect prepping for underwater dives on primitive servers.

items.name: Serene Mind Potion
items.description: This potion puts one into a focused, metatative state for a decent amount of time. In this state, survivors find their efficiency in doing skills increase, as well as heightened focus across survivors and creatures as well. Prevents even the angriest of creatures from raging.

items.name: Hidden Potion
items.description: A potion that temporarily makes all skittish creatures oblivious to your presence unless you get right up to them. Might be useful for some passive tames...

items.name: Taming Elixir
items.description: Reduces the food of a KO'd creature a set amount. Helps assist taming.

items.name: Cadaver Brain
items.description: Usually obtained from undeads, such as Withered, or even from graves, or..... well, you're not that much of a monster, right?

items.name: Cadaver Eye
items.description: Usually obtained from undeads, such as Withered, or even from graves, or..... well, you're not that much of a monster, right?

items.name: Cadaver Flesh
items.description: Usually obtained from undeads, such as Withered, or even from graves, or..... well, you're not that much of a monster, right?

items.name: Cadaver Heart
items.description: Usually obtained from undeads, such as Withered, or even from graves, or..... well, you're not that much of a monster, right?

items.name: Cadaver Lungs
items.description: Usually obtained from undeads, such as Withered, or even from graves, or..... well, you're not that much of a monster, right?

items.name: Cadaver Muscle
items.description: Usually obtained from undeads, such as Withered, or even from graves, or..... well, you're not that much of a monster, right?

items.name: Subcutaneous Cadaver Tissue
items.description: Usually obtained from undeads, such as Withered, or even from graves, or..... well, you're not that much of a monster, right?

items.name: Pyrian Snow Owl Saddle
items.description: Equip an Snow Owl with this to ride it.

items.name: Create Automaton
items.description: Use some magic and some metal to sculpt an Automaton: A heartless, iron guard-warrior.

items.name: Activated Balrog Core
items.description: Use this to bring your newly created Balrog to life!

items.name: Create Dark Mana Reaper Drone
items.description: Use an extensive dark magic spell to conjure up a loyal, permanent Dark Mana Reaper Drone. Takes a lot to craft, since you 're trying to make it permanent, and arent a dark paladin or etc....but, that doesn't mean you can't use it for good either! Kill one in the wild to unlock this engram.

items.name: Enslave Dark Mana Reaper Empress
items.description: Use unfathomable black magic, as well as the agony of your enemies, to summon in a Dark Mana Reaper Empress to assist you for ten minutes. Defeat a wild Dark Mana Reaper Empress to unlock this engram.

items.name: Create Dark Mana Seeker
items.description: Use Dark Magic to conjure up a Dark Mana Seeker, a tainted variant of an Aura Seeker. Defeat a Dark Mana Reaper Empress to unlock this engram.

items.name: Resurrect & Augment Everlast Drallion
items.description: Use this to not also purify and "tame" an Everlast Drallion, but also enhance it: by crudely graphing metal weapons into it's body. Strangely enough, it doesn't mind at all...

items.name: Resurrect Fire Everlast Drallion
items.description: Use this to not also purify and "tame" an Everlast Drallion, but also enhance it: embuing it with the element of Fire thanks to its natural affinity.

items.name: Resurrect Ice Everlast Drallion
items.description: Use this to not also purify and "tame" an Everlast Drallion, but also enhance it: embuing it with the element of Ice thanks to its natural affinity.

items.name: Create Fallen
items.description: Use a bit of necromancy and conjure up a Fallen: a basic type of autonomous undead. These can use multiple types of gear, becoming dangerous in groups but failing rapidly as soon as their weapons break.

items.name: Activated Fire Elemental Core
items.description: Use this to bring your newly created Fire Elemental to life!

items.name: Create Alpha Fulgur Carnotaurus
items.description: Use this to resurrect an Alpha Carnotaurus killed from it's Spited state into an Alpha Fulgur Carnotaurus

items.name: Create Gargoyle
items.description: Use this to create a Gargoyle: a living statue protector!

items.name: Activated Glacier Golem Core
items.description: Use this to bring your newly created Glacier Golem to life!

items.name: Create Hellhound
items.description: Use this to create a Hellhound. A loyal spectral hound.

items.name: Create Alpha Infernal Tyrannosaurus
items.description: Use this to resurrect an Alpha Tyrannosaurus killed from it's Spited state into an Alpha Infernal Tyrannosaurus

items.name: Summon Sentinel
items.description: Use this to temporarily summon a loyal Sentinel to your side.

items.name: Create Withered
items.description: Use a bit of necromancy and conjure up a Withered: a basic type of autonomous undead.

items.name: Golem Booster
items.description: A harnessed Shattered Colossus core. This should be able to supercharge any type of golem...

items.name: Mana
items.description:
An ethereal energy created by one's very life energy. It connects all living things, and is a major source of magical energy. It can be augmented into other more powerful forms...

"With Breath, we gave Life. With Life, we gave Thought. With thought, you gave villainy and heroism."

items.name: Dark Mana
items.description:
Mana embued with demonic energy, dark thoughts and morals. Vile in every way, the source of energy for many evil things... can be purified into large amounts of standard mana.

"Within each of us all is a shred of Dark. Even the most holy, and pure of us have the imperfections. Reject this truth, reject the unpolished, and you've only fueled the war that lasts until today."

items.name: Dark Or Light Mana
items.description: Manabase.POG

items.name: Light Mana
items.description:
Mana embued with positive morals, benevolent thoughts and beliefs. A powerful source of magic and power for the side of light. Can be returned to standard mana.

"To break free of the inclinations and perfections, to be all that one can be: that is true Light. Aramy.

To chastize the imperfect, to pursue perfection... is to be no different than those you persecute."

items.name: Diluted Light Mana
items.description:
Light Mana obtained through the act of murder committed on a sentient race. Stained with blood, it's useless to somebody like you, unless...

"To seize power, one must take it. By my grace do I protect them, and the flow of balance. Cast thine ambitions and persistance elsewhere, fiend."

items.name: Alpha Carnotaurus Remains
items.description:
The skeletal remains of an Alpha Carnotaurus, the Dark Mana bindings and their corruption having corroded away. As impressive as the creature in real life was.

"Wherever I went, there were they too. My chief could not protect me, and alone, they always found me. 

Why, what had i done...?"

items.name: Alpha Carnotaurus Soul
items.description:
The lonely soul of an Alpha Carnotaurus, now at peace after its Dark, Spited form has been slain. Perhaps you can resurrect it?

"I wanted to rest in shame, yet they brought me back. A different blood surged through my veins.

With it, I knew I only wanted revenge on what killed me, yet gave me life."

items.name: Alpha Tyrannosaurus Remains
items.description:
The skeletal remains of an Alpha Tyrannosaurus, the Dark Mana bindings and their corruption having corroded away. As impressive as the creature in real life was.

"How I had once breathed prideful as king. Yet what did that amount to, when the pillagers came? Hard-fought was my throne, yet even I stood not a chance. How does one go from king to cattle?

Would I give it all, just to know comfort and affection again..."

items.name: Alpha Tyrannosaurus Soul
items.description:
The lonely soul of an Alpha Tyrannosaurus, now at peace after its Dark, Spited form has been slain. Perhaps you can resurrect it?

"Power was all I had, and they gave it to me again... but I remembered. We all did. So we turned against the fools, to return to the life we hoped we could not live. My pain was great, my furor rampant, yet now I return to dust and rest. I thank you.

Be I put to rest, or allowed my throne once again...my favor does not part with thee."

items.name: Shattered Colossus Core
items.description:
The old, shattered core of a colossus that once gave it life and energy. It still contains some energy, perhaps if used correctly...?

"Whatever civilization utilized this, it was a bygone era with mana technology lost to time. Artificial, yet natural. Atrocity against nature, or mana-technological marvel?

At either rate, a true monster."

items.name: Dark Mana Reaper Empress Blood
items.description:
The vile blood of a Dark Mana Reaper Empress: Proof of your heroic triumph over a entity of darkness.

"The Empress was just a vessel. Another form for a Conflux."

items.name: Dark Mana Reaper Empress Scale
items.description:
The scales of a Dark Mana Reaper Empress: Proof of your heroic triumph over a entity of darkness.

"It was just a body, one they liked. Savage, and skilled anew. Easy to weild, and easy to manipulate..."

items.name: Dark Mana Reaper Scales
items.description:
The scales of a Dark Mana Reaper, the loyal pet of the Dark Paladins. Heroes use these as trophies of their feats, but you could also use it to create Dark Mana Reapers of your own....

"It was in the trials of survival did they meet them, twisted, naturally tuned already to the massacre of our enemies. Their forms fit well, and thus did our Familiars take them for themselves."

items.name: Dark Mana Reaper Head
items.description:
The whole head of a Dark Mana Reaper, the loyal pet of the Dark Paladins. Heroes use these as trophies of their feats, but you could also use it to create Dark Mana Reapers of your own....

"These faces are not our own, yet what does it matter? We were alike, yet the same. Both of us, predators of the weak, and feeble of man.

We simply enjoyed our new toys."

items.name: Dark Mana Reaper Tailspike
items.description:
The tail spines of a Dark Mana Reaper, the loyal pet of the Dark Paladins. Heroes use these as trophies of their feats, but you could also use it to create Dark Mana Reapers of your own....

"We are no different. Not from the husks, but from you. We are not our own devils, our own familiars...

We are you, and that is why we resonate so well with you."

items.name: Soul
items.description:
One who was seized in etheral grasp and prevented from resting or going to its rightful place. Now, it stares at you silently. Yet, you feel something...yet is it conviction, or hunger?

"Let thy kin rest, as all things must. Devour them, and begin you the unsalvageable path of greatest sin."

items.name: Dark Soul
items.description:
One who stepped deep into the path of the dark. Tainted with Dark Mana, some of them knew not themselves from their puppeteer.

"Some of us were born of it, others embraced it. Yet, you told us to be proud of, and embrace, who we are.

When you rejected us, we did just that. For the Dark was inside us all. For that, we were closer related to those born of the Dark than you."

items.name: Dark Archer Soul
items.description:
The soul of a Dark Archer. Cynnical, Light-hearted, cruel. A sharp eye and skilled mind loosed arrows in self-centered desire and joy. Now, she smiles no more.

"I miss the voices, I miss the affection. I let my heart and mind wander, pulled by the wild joys and rides of the other. Power, free joy, wild times of whatever I desired...men, women, riches...

and yet almost never did I see a face that brought me true joy...the joy was more frequent, embracing the darkness instead of masking it... but my joy was no longer ever lasting!

My kin, please, spare me!..."

items.name: Dark Berserker Soul
items.description:
The soul of a Dark Berserker. True to her name, her furor and hate powered her and her blade to rend all in her way. Now, she herself has been rended.

"I hated the remarks. I hated you. I hated all of you, the nagging, the soothing voices... I knew what I was doing, yet constantly, did you annoy me. Correct me, condemn me. All I wanted was to prove you wrong, to silence the voices... and I enjoyed it...the silence, the cut tongues...

...yet now, I've never wanted to hear them more...forgive me..."

items.name: Insidious Eminence Soul
items.description:
The soul of an Insidious Eminence. A terrifying dark power, she crushed all under her blade and heel. Now, she has been brought to heel herself.

"Power and hate were one in the same to me. There was no restriction, only a show of skill. Whatever my will and skill allowed, I could take among the Dark. I could not do the same among the Light.

You said you wished for us to grow, yet you constricted us. 

I know why, now. The want was great. So was I pulled.

and now, I regret nothing. Consume me, or leave me to rot. I will look upon you no different. Seize your fate, as I did, knowing now my failure..."

items.name: Insidious Fortitudo Soul
items.description:
The soul of an Insidious Fortitudo. Once, the giant crushed all in havok and furor, leaving nothing but desolation. Now, he has been destroyed.

"Power needs no limits. I cannot limit myself in which to grow. Thus, I could not protect.

So I abandoned that which I needed to protect...and allowed myself free power and reign to destroy. I wasn't just an entity. I was a force, an absolute...

...until you came along. For that, I respect you."

items.name: Dark Paladin Soul
items.description:
The soul of a Dark Paladin. Once, a vanguard of light. Then, did he turn to a vanguard for his own selfish ambitions. Now, he, and his dreams, are crushed.

"I gave, but felt nothing at my back but entitlement. Expectation. I gave, and felt nothing in return. So I took, and for once, I felt, and wanted more.

Gluttony, even not of the true kind, really did lead to my end...

I enjoyed over-partaking...and as such, I expect no quarter."

items.name: Insidious Zenith Soul
items.description:
The soul of an Insidious Zenith. A cunning, cruel mind who used her intellect for her own gain and played others as her puppets. Now, her playtime has been harshly ended.

"Was I lured by power, riches, or some other desire? It'd been too long....All my plans, all my desires, my willingness... all lead to nothing...

I gave, but rarely was I ever repaid in honest...I forgot kindness, though I showed it. It was a tool...I missed smiling faces...How many times had I lowered myself, to better myself or find those I could bond to?

I miss my real bonds, now at Oblivion's gate...I wish to see true smiles again...

My Kin and Ilias forgive me, and please grant this old fool mercy!...."

items.name: Light Soul
items.description:
One who once attempted to walk the side of the Light. Against the dark, they had their own struggle against imperfection.

"We tried, we were lured, same as you. Yet, we persecuted you and others. Please, forgive us..."

items.name: Divine Archer Soul
items.description:
The soul of a Divine Archer. Once, a smiling face who graced all she met. Now, silent, and observing you.

"I was joyful for others, to try and ease the pain. I was never meant to seem aloof. The joy I made, I did to try and help myself and others through the pull of our imperfections. When you raged against me for this misunderstanding, my own imperfection made me lash back.

Please, smile for me..."

items.name: Divine Berserker Soul
items.description:
The soul of a Divine Berserker. Once, a ferocious maiden who fought for what she believed was right. Now, she stares silently at you.

"We all made mistakes, some of us were pulled harder. At times, we would lash out. When we did, often more than you. We tried to ignore it, rather than take responsibility.

Forgive me, please. I'll take my proper punishment, my kin.."

items.name: Divine Convalesce Soul
items.description:
The soul of a Divine Convalesce. Once, the tender soul healed and mended the wounded, even reviving the dead. Now, there is none to help him.

"Was I as they call, Aramy?

I gave and gave. I healed, I mended. I'd set those who walked with hollow feet or dark intent back to their rightful rest. I expected nothing, but to help those live to see their tomorrows. I doctored, I preached, I saved, I practicioned...

...and for all of that, I am at peace, at my eternity's door itself.

Do as you will. I am ready."

items.name: Divine Eminence Soul
items.description:
The soul of a Divine Eminence. In life, she was an unbreakable vanguard, whose power and ferocious skills masked a soft, inner beauty no different than any other. Now, she is broken.

"I was like you. Even among my kin, I felt the looks. I was too brutish...too awkward. Some would see the real me, and call me beautiful, even adorable...

...but you and I both just wanted to be more widely accepted, didn't we?

I thought about this often, yet my own desires to appease my kin and be loved turned me against you. In that stance, we're no different, are we? Whether it be power or acceptance...

...I know, and thus I accept my fate."

items.name: Divine Paladin Soul
items.description:
The soul of a Divine Paladin, captured after death. Once, it attempted to protect valliantly those who could not protect themselves. Now, it is helpless in your hands.

"Power is a drug, an alcholol. Something to be used responsibly, and not one of us is entitled to it. I thought I needed to use this power to protect those who needed it. We all must become stronger, but please...

do not give in to that which will lead to destruction!"

items.name: Divine Zenith
items.description:
The soul of a Divine Zenith. A tall, beautiful protector of light. Well-respected and well-revered, she was Mediator, Teacher, and Sister to all. Now, perhaps one last time, she is humbled.

"I tried my best, just to give hope. To give peace, to grant countless tomorrows. I cared for everyone, and I cared too much. The stress, the pain, the worry. I wanted so little to do with it and I managed it poorly. I understood the job, as difficult as it was, and what I needed to do. On paper, it seemed so straightforward. Yet I would lash out, my frustrations turned upon you from this immense weight and duty...

Please, spare me! It is not too late for you, nor me!"

items.name: Recruiter's Badge
items.description: Use this to let your chosen delegate attempt to recruit the other races of Pyria.

items.name: Gelragarian Ingot
items.description: Give it to a Gelragarian and they will be able to upgrade weapons sold at their shop! Can also be refined if you give a Gelragarian smithy enough metal.

items.name: Mermaid Ingot
items.description: Give it to a Gelragarian and they will be able to upgrade weapons bought from a Mermaid shop! Can also be refined if you give a Gelragarian smithy enough metal.

items.name: Orc Ingot
items.description: Give it to a Orc and they will be able to upgrade weapons sold at their shop! Can also be refined if you give a Orc smithy enough metal.

items.name: Alchemy Station
items.description: Place ingredients and resources in here to create various mystical items!

items.name: RAF Commander's Note 1
items.description:
{illegible}, 24, 16

So Treyour finally gave me the priviledge of going out on her smok to see what it's like. I get why they call them Lords of the Sky. {illegible} Smok's a master tactician. Rush by right under a foe, hit 'em with a tail slash in the process: ya set em up for a direct hit from the acid breath that you can actually aim instead of firing wildly. Hell of a combo

{Illegible} Commander of Ravencliff Air Force, Royal Gale Division.

items.name: RAF Commander's Note 2
Royal Scientists's Note1
items.description:
March 12, 16

Have to remind myself of the usual elemental resistances and weaknesses that go through Pyria consistantly.

-Light? Obscured by Dark
-Dark? Outshined by light
-Electric? Frozen by Ice, sometimes fried by fire.
-Dead? Smited by Light, Magic, and Wyverns.
-Fire? Doused by Water or Ice.
-Ice? Melted by Fire or shattered by electricity.
-Water? Evaporated by Electricity, sometimes by fire. Sometimes even slightly resistant to fire.
-Earth? Explosions or stone-shattering blows
-Dragon? Slays its kin.

{illegible}, Royal Scientist of Ravencliff

items.name: Royal Scientists's Note 2
items.description:
Feb 14 20

I've yet to see many people use a Drallion effectively. They need to stop treating it as a flying animal, but rather a terrestrial animal that CAN fly if needed. It's no wyvern and is far more adapted at terrestrial locomotion and combat. Only use flight for getting over obstacles or avoiding terrestrial threats, maybe reaching hard-to-get metal nodes.

{illegible}, Royal Scientist of Ravencliff

items.name: Royal Scientists's Note 3
items.description:
Oct 12 16

I {illegible} a better pen. Regardless, the fact that Divines can create Light Aura can make them great in magical preparation over time. Dark Mana Reaper are their "dark mana" production counterparts. Beats having to craft it yourself

{illegible}, Royal Scientist of Ravencliff

items.name: Warrior Queen's Note1
Warrior Queen's Note2
Warrior Queen's Note3
Black Pearl Dust
items.description: Only a Balrog is capable of generating enough heat to burn down black pearls into this dust. Strangely enough, in this state Black Pearls seem to have even higher magic power... Can also be reformed into it's original state, but only by a Balrog.

items.name: Mithril Ingot
items.description: Created by refining Mithril ore in a forge of a Pyrian race. This metal is phenomenally durable, yet light.

items.name: Mithril Ore
items.description: A metal from Pyria, seeming to be a natural composite of titanium and silver. Used with Magicrystal for powerful, fine craft in gear. A Pyrian smith should be able to work with this.

items.name: Fulgur Crystal
items.description: A crystal rarely found in nature, though commonly found growing on the elder HC Diorex. These strange, blue crystals are highly conductive by nature; and can easily store, conduct, and generate massive electrical charges. A prized resource!

items.name: Ignistone
items.description:
A volcanic stone, embued with a mixture of fire and earth elements in a natural blend, forged within volcanic crucible.

A stable form of Fire Element.

items.name: Magicrystal
items.description:
Crystal enchanted with arcane energy and mana, becoming a powerful conductor for it. It's normally fabricated, but can be very rarely formed naturally in nature. 

It can be made into lenses, used as an electronics component, or mixed into powerful explosives

items.name: Pyrian Basilisk Saddle
items.description: A Basilisk saddle made from materials that can be easily assembled in Pyria, without Abberation. Used for both normal Basilisk as well as Glacial Basilisk

items.name: Upgraded Pyrian Basilisk Saddle
items.description: A Pyrian Basilisk Saddle upgraded with mana and a Drallion Gem. Defeat an ArchDemon to unlock this.

items.name: Pyrian Ravager Saddle
items.description: Equip a Ravager with this to ride it. It's made from materials easily accessible in Pyria.

items.name: Pyrian Ravager Combat Saddle
items.description: Ravagers are a respected and frequently used mount in Pyria. Equip a Ravager with this to not also ride it, but provide more armor to it.

items.name: Upgraded Pyrian Ravager Combat Saddle
items.description: A Pyrian Ravager Combat Saddle, upgraded by enchanting it using mana and a Drallion Gem. Defeat an Ogre to unlock this engram.

items.name: Centaur Terror Bird Saddle
items.description: Equip a Centaur Terror Bird with this to ride it.

items.name: Dragonkin Kinship Rune
items.description: A kinship rune specifically designed for all forms of dragonkin, and some other beasts. Harder to craft, but provides more protection. Compatible with Classic Flyers Wyverns and Griffins.

items.name: Upgraded Dragonkin Kinship Rune
items.description:
A Dragonkin Kinship Rune upgraded with a Drallion Gem and Mana.
Defeat an ArchDemon to unlock this engram.

items.name: Kinship Rune
items.description: An enchanted rune that strengthens your mount, by strengthening the bond you have with it. Acts similar to a saddle, and is universally compatible with many of Pyria's creatures.

items.name: Upgraded Kinship Rune
items.description: An upgraded Kinship Rune, empowered by Mana and a Drallion Gem. Defeat an Ogre to unlock this engram.

items.name: Pyrian Rock Drake Saddle
items.description: Equip a Rock Drake with this to ride it. It is made from materials easily accessible in Pyria.

items.name: Upgraded Pyrian Rock Drake Saddle
items.description: A Pyrian Rock Drake saddle, upgraded with Mana and a Drallion Gem. Defeat a Diorex to unlock this engram.

items.name: Offhand Metal Shield
items.description: An offhand Metal shield for sentient beings, provides some armor.

items.name: Offhand Riot Shield
items.description: An offhand Riot shield for sentient beings, provides some  armor.

items.name: Offhand Royal Shield
items.description: An offhand shield for sentient beings, provides some armor. Augmented with a drallion gem and mana, given a rather royal and extravagant look. Defeat an Ogre to unlock this.

items.name: Offhand Wooden Shield
items.description: An offhand wooden shield for sentient beings, provides some slight armor.

items.name: Spell: Grand Radia
items.description:
A potent light-and-nature elemental spell that radiates healing energy to the auras of all nearby. The amount scales based on your Fortitude stat, to a max.

Statistics:
-Upkeep: -1 Stam per sec + (Fortitude stat x 0.25) = Stamina Cost per Sec (max 100)
-Potency: 20 HP per sec + (Fortitude stat x2.0)= HP regen per sec to allies (max 550)
-Range: 6400 Units

items.name: Spell: Radia
items.description:
A light-and-nature elemental spell that radiates healing energy to the auras of all nearby. The amount scales based on your Fortitude stat, to a max.

Statistics:
-Upkeep: -1 Stam per sec + (Fortitude stat x 0.15) = Stamina Cost per Sec (max 50)
-Potency: 10 HP per sec + (Fortitude stat x1.45)= HP regen per sec to allies (max 250)
-Range: 3200 Units

items.name: Spell: Transfusion Touch
items.description:
A light-and-nature elemental spell that radiates healing energy to the mount you ride, via tendrils. It roots you in place: preventing you from dismounting, but increasing your defense in the process

Statistics:
-Upkeep: -1 Stam per sec + (Fortitude stat x 0.15) = Stamina Cost per Sec (max 50)
-Potency: 20 HP per sec + (Fortitude stat x2)= HP regen per sec to Mount (max 550)

items.name: Spell: Self-Upkeep
items.description:
A maintenance spell that can only be cast as you're using other spells. It helps offset the exertion of casting.

Statistics:
-5% of Fortitude stat is converted into Stamina Regen

items.name: Necromancy Totem
items.description: Place this down and fuel with mana to create a large AoE for undeads, buffing them and making them more powerful. Be warned, as even enemy undeads will be buffed.

items.name: Gravity Well
items.description: Place this down and fuel with mana to create a large AoE for undeads, buffing them and making them more powerful. Be warned, as even enemy undeads will be buffed.

items.name: Boom Cannon
items.description: Said to be developed by a alchitect who arrived from an advanced time. Uses fire element and pressure to launch explosive Bazel Crystal-tipped bolts with extreme effectiveness

items.name: Bastard Sword (Troop)
items.description:
A weapon made by gelragarian's. It's Huge and heavy but those swings will be devestating! It works more like a hatchet than a sword for gathering!

Made to be used by certain tames, which tend to cause mass durability damage by swinging them wildly. As such, the increased crafting cost grants 6x durability

items.name: Bladed Mace (Troop)
items.description: A weapon made by Gelragarians. It's heavy but strong. It can mine minerals like a pickaxe or axe!

items.name: Great Axe
items.description: A weapon made by Gelragarians. It's heavy but strong. It works like an extremely dangerous hatchet!

items.name: Ruler'sBlade
items.description:
A sword that was once owned by a gelragarian king.

Until a marauder beheaded him with it.

items.name: Ruler'sBlade
items.description:
A sword that was once owned by a gelragarian king.

Until a marauder beheaded him with it.

items.name: Savage Axe (Troop)
items.description:
A weapon made by Orcs. It's relatively light and easy to use. It works like an extremely dangerous hatchet! Can also cause a minor bleed effect on hit [15% chance]

Made to be used by certain tames, which tend to cause mass durability damage by swinging them wildly. As such, the increased crafting cost grants 6x durability

items.name: Savage Cutlass (Troop)
items.description:
A weapon made by Orcs. It's heavy but strong! Can also cause a minor bleed effect on hit [25% chance]

Made to be used by certain tames, which tend to cause mass durability damage by swinging them wildly. As such, the increased crafting cost grants 6x durability

items.name: Magicrystal Pike
items.description: Crafting from raw magicrystal in such a manner is a lost art. Where'd you find this?...

items.name: Magicrystal Long Sword
items.description: Crafting from raw magicrystal in such a manner is a lost art. Where'd you find this?...

items.name: Dragon King's Feast
items.description:
An extremely succulent, expertly-prepared serving of meat fit for a king of dragons. Offer it to one to gain its interest, and strike up a respectful conversation.

You may be rewarded for doing so, if your aura is impressive enough for them to allow you near them...

items.name: Ryu Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

items.name: Fertilized Ryu Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides exceptional nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Smok Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

items.name: Fertilized Smok Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides exceptional nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Immortal Seed
items.description: This seed, produced by a dead Yggdrasil, is used to reincarnate it. Thus, the creature never truly dies...

items.name: Balrog Black Pearl
items.description: Only a Balrog is able to generate the heat needed to return Black Pearl Dust into it's original form. Useful if you need black pearls in their original state, but want them broken down for ease of carry. Reform em when you need em!

items.name: Balrog Charcoal
items.description: Charcoal created by your Balrog incinerating wood into charcoal. Useful!

items.name: Balrog Core
items.description:
This trophy proves your worth as a hunter.
The core of a Balrog, that once- and still does- hold it's life energy. Can be used to create a loyal Balrog of your own.

"With Fire, there is power, force, and will. With Earth, an immense physical power and unmoving steadfastness. What cannot be moved willingly, must be moved by force. These elements alone, have just that.

Combined, the two form power absolute, in nature's most raw form. The earth explodes, and the Balrog is born. As ferocious- yet gentle- as the earth it is born from."

items.name: Balrog Gunpowder
items.description: Charcoal created by your Balrog mixing volatile resources into gunpowder. Useful!

items.name: Balrog Meat Jerky
items.description: Meat Jerky created by your Balrog quick-drying cooked meat! Mmmm~

items.name: Balrog Prime Meat Jerky
items.description: Prime Meat Jerky created by your Balrog quick-cooking cooked prime meat! Mmmm~

items.name: Balrog Metal Ingot
items.description: Metal Ingots efficiently smelted from your Balrog on command. Useful!

items.name: Balrog Obsidian
items.description: Obsidian effectively created from your Balrog on command, by baking sand into volcanic glass. Useful!

items.name: Balrog Propellant
items.description: Propellant created by your Balrog breaking down sulfur into Propellant. Useful!

items.name: Balrog Sulfur
items.description: Sulfur created by your Balrog breaking down stone into sulfur. Useful!

items.name: Chibi-Colossus
items.description: Earn XP from Alpha creature kills when equipped, to increase its level and earn additional max-levels for your Survivor!

items.name: Fire Elemental Core
items.description:
This trophy proves your worth as a hunter.
The core of a Fire Elemental, that once- and still does- hold it's life energy. Can be used to create a loyal Fire Elemental of your own.

"A will to live, a will to thrive, a will of life. What remains wishes for life once more, and when blessed by fire, becomes new life, and takes flight."

items.name: Ice Crystal
items.description: Created by a Glacier Golem. If removed from its inventory, it will quickly spoil.

items.name: Create Crystals
items.description: Ice Crystals created by your tamed Glacier Golem slowly processing stone to crystal, at your command.

items.name: Glacier Golem Core
items.description:
This trophy proves your worth as a hunter.
The core of a Glacier Golem, that once- and still does- hold it's life energy. Can be used to create a loyal Glacier Golem of your own.

"Slow is the glacier, but its force absolute. The mountain crumbles, and life is crushed an consumed. None survive, unless their force is stronger than it, or they outrun it.

When life pools, and mixes with Ice and Earth, does the Glacier grow anew, with refined power to crush and consume."

items.name: Gelragarian's Shop
items.description: Everything you need to set up a shop for a Gelragarian! Place it down and they'll handle the rest!

items.name: Bastard Sword
items.description: A weapon made by gelragarian's. It's Huge and heavy but those swings will be devestating! It works more like a hatchet than a sword for gathering!

items.name: Bladed Mace
items.description: A weapon made by Gelragarians. It's heavy but strong. It can mine minerals like a pickaxe or axe!

items.name: Great Axe
items.description: A weapon made by Gelragarians. It's heavy but strong. It works like an extremely dangerous hatchet!

items.name: War Hammer
items.description: A weapon made by Gelragarians. It's heavy but not as heavy as the other weapons. It can mine minerals like a pickaxe or axe!

items.name: Long Sword
items.description: A weapon made by Gelragarians. It's heavy but strong and long! It works more like a hatchet than a sword for gathering!

items.name: Spiked Hammer
items.description: A weapon made by Gelragarians. It's heavy but strong. It can mine minerals like a pickaxe or axe!

items.name: Cultivated Bio Toxin
items.description: Powerful toxin harvested from an organism. This particular version was cultivated by mermaids![Gives 5]

items.name: Cultivated Ammonite Bile
items.description: A congealed glob of Ammonite Bile. Can be used for medicinal purposes when carefully prepared. This particular version was cultivated by mermaids! [Gives 6]

items.name: Cultivated AnglerGel
items.description: A thick, viscous substance that can sustain a flame for a remarkably long duration. This particular version was cultivated by mermaids![Gives 30]

items.name: Cultvated Black Pearl
items.description: A rare resource from the bottom of the sea...This particular version was cultivated by mermaids! [Gives 5]

items.name: Cultivated Organic Polymer
items.description: These incredibly strong, lightweight plates are somehow naturally made in certain creatures. Incredibly hazardous to human health if consumed. This particular version was cultivated by mermaids!

items.name: Cultivated Silica Pearls
items.description: These pearls are made almost entirely of Silicon.  Can be refined into Silicon plates. This particular version was cultivated by mermaids! [gives 10]

items.name: Mermaid's Shop
items.description: Everything you need to set up a shop for a mermaid! Make sure it's in water and she'll be right at home!

items.name: Mermaid Dueling Sword
items.description: It's a bit longer than a normal sword but still somehow lighter you should be able to swing faster with this!

items.name: Mermaid Long Sword
items.description: Longer than a normal sword but weighs the same! It also does more damage.

items.name: Mermaid Trident
items.description: A Trident used by mermaids, it weighs the same as a pike but deals more damage!

items.name: Mermaid Silver Spear
items.description: A spear used by mermaids. it's longer than a normal pike and its lighter as well which allows for swifter attacks.

items.name: Bug Repellant
items.description: This gnarly paste makes you nearly invisible to bugs, bats, and spiders. Just don't attack them or get too close, and they'll ignore you! Effect lasts 10 minutes. [Gives 20]

items.name: Lesser Antidote
items.description: Cures Lesser Afflictions![Gives 20]

items.name: Narcotic
items.description: Increases your health, but puts you to sleep.[Gives 120]

items.name: Stimulant
items.description: Keeps you awake, but dehydrates you.[Gives 120]

items.name: Cementing Paste
items.description: This thick, waterproof paste could be used as mortar, or to thicken another substance.[Gives 100]

items.name: Gunpowder
items.description: An powerful propellant. Necessary for any firearm or explosive.[Gives 225]

items.name: Propellant
items.description: Used to manufacture highly flammable substances. [Gives 80]

items.name: Sparkpowder
items.description: Created by grinding flint with stone in a Mortar and Pestle or Chemistry Table.[Gives 260]

items.name: Centaur Shop
items.description: Everything you need to set up a shop for a Centaur! Make sure it's not in water and they'll be right at home!

items.name: Centaur Shop
items.description: Everything you need to set up a shop for a Centaur! Make sure it's not in water and they'll be right at home!

items.name: Orc Shop
items.description: Everything you need to set up a shop for an Orc! Place it down and they'll handle the rest!

items.name: Barbarian's Axe
items.description: A weapon made by Orcs. It's heavy but not as heavy as the other weapons. It can mine minerals like a pickaxe or axe! It is very basic with no special qualities, however it is very easy and cheap to make.

items.name: Savage Axe
items.description: A weapon made by Orcs. It's relatively light and easy to use. It works like an extremely dangerous hatchet! Can also cause a minor bleed effect on hit [15% chance]

items.name: Savage Club
items.description: A weapon made by Orcs. It's heavy but strong. It can mine minerals like a pickaxe or axe! Can also cause a minor bleed effect on hit [40% chance]

items.name: Savage Cutlass
items.description: A weapon made by Orcs. It's heavy but strong! Can also cause a minor bleed effect on hit [25% chance]

items.name: Savage Great Axe
items.description: A weapon made by Orcs. It's heavy but strong. It works like an extremely dangerous hatchet! Can also cause a minor bleed effect on hit [60% chance]

items.name: Fertilized Aberrant Sarco Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides regular nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Arcane Stego Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides regular nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Tusoteuthis Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment

items.name: Ash Plume Rock Drake Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

items.name: Fertilized Ash Plume Rock Drake Egg
Fertilized Aura Seeker Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides superior nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Dark Seeker Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides superior nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Aura Seeker Bait Kibble
items.description: Kibble specifically designed for Aura Seekers for taming. They love this stuff!

items.name: Fertilized Bantu Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides simple nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Brute Wyvern Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

items.name: Fertilized Brute Wyvern Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides exceptional nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Cockatrice Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

items.name: Cockatrice Venom
items.description: Potent venom from a Cockatrice! Can be used to coat arrows and make Venom Arrows.

items.name: Fertilized Dark Reaper Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides superior nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Dagon Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides extraordinary nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Divine Allosaurus Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides superior nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Drachenthorne Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides extraordinary nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Everlast Drallion Gem
items.description:
The Drallion Gem of an Everlast Drallion. It burns angrily with a strange power...

"A dragon's hate and wrath are undying. Do you feel my hate for the undragon?

Once, I had it, until I met the Aramy Queen. What grants thee spite? 

Are you remembering, now? Are you becoming more attuned to my gifts? Is that why, now, in undeath, you persist past such normal mortal bounds?

Thou art remembering and progressing similar to thy dragon and undragon kin, but are becoming attuned to the dark and light. Walk the path carefully, my kin..."

items.name: Drallion Gem
items.description:
A gem formed inside the body of a Drallion, formed from various impurities. It holds a strange power within. Highly sought after in magic.

"And so does my lineage progress down to even thee, my most distant of kin. Thou art not just an animal, but by my bloodline, royal in lineage. Thou cans't simply, by thy will, command nature and the elements, no different than the undragon. One does not need, as thy Great Kin prove, a body like the undragon to gain free will, and power.

So go forth unto the world my children, and evolve. Take our primal breath- the fire- as your tool, and learn. One day, perhaps ascending to a throne of your own amongst your Great Kin. Let my divine voice howl within your own, and show the world belongs to dragon as much as man."

items.name: Fertilized Drallion Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides superior nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Firepike Thorny Dragon Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

items.name: Fertilized Firepike Thorny Dragon Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides simple nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Gelragarian Direwolf Saddle
items.description: Equip a Gelragarian Direwolf with this to ride it. You can't help but feel it's a bit uhh...big for a survivor like you.

items.name: Fertilized Soldier Bug Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides superior nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Soldier Bug Venom
items.description: Potent venom from a Soldier Bug. A potent substance used in a nefarious recipie for one of the deadliest tools in assasination....

items.name: Fertilized Glacial Basilisk Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides extraordinary nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Infernal Basilisk Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides extraordinary nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Eldritch Hailfire Wyvern Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

items.name: Eldritch Hailfire Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides exceptional nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Bazel Crystal
items.description: The crystals that grow on the underside of Eldritch Hailfire Wyverns, and are dislodged as projectiles by the mighty wyvern. Explosive: handle with care. A Powerful source of fire element, it can also be weaponized. Named after a species of wyvern said to behave similar to the Eldritch....

items.name: Break Down Bazel Crystal
items.description: Take a singular Bazel Crystal and carefully break it down for all of it's valuable resources.

items.name: Fertilized Horoku Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides superior nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Elemental Kaiser Bug Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides superior nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Miralis Yutyrannus Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

items.name: Fertilized Miralis Yutyrannus Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides extraordinary nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Rok Egg
items.description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

items.name: Fertilized Rok Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides exceptional nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Fertilized Sulfurwyrm Egg
items.description: Tremendously nourishing by itself, this egg provides regular nutritional value in many cooking recipes.

items.name: Dinosaur Feces
items.description:
Everyone poops.
Can provide nitrogen to help crops grow in their plots.  Would be more efficient fertilizer if combined with thatch in a bin.
